actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Public Lands, National Parks and Forests

official_title: A bill to authorize a land exchange involving the Cleveland National Forest, California, and a corresponding boundary adjustment for the forest, and for other purposes.
short_title: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992

summary.text: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992 - Directs the Secretary of Agriculture to convey certain land in the Cleveland National Forest, California, to the Orange County Council of the Boy Scouts of America in exchange for specified land in San Diego County, California, which shall become part of such Forest.

titles.title: Cleveland National Forest Land Exchange Act of 1992
A bill to authorize a land exchange involving the Cleveland National Forest, California, and a corresponding boundary adjustment for the forest, and for other purposes.
